scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run prettier && npm run test
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run setLocalEnv" "cross-env PORT=3000 react-scripts --openssl-legacy-provider start"
scripts.start:local: concurrently "node mock" "npm run setLocalEnv" "cross-env PORT=3000 BROWSER=none vite --force" "launch-luminate-portal"
scripts.start:local:legacy: concurrently "node mock" "npm run setLocalEnv" "cross-env PORT=3000 BROWSER=none react-scripts --openssl-legacy-provider start" "launch-luminate-portal"
scripts.build:mfe: tsc && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8172 vite build --mode mfe
scripts.test:e2e:chrome: cross-env TZ=Australia/Adelaide TS_NODE_PROJECT=e2e/tsconfig.json wdio run e2e/configs/wdio.local.chrome.conf.ts
scripts.test:e2e:saucelabs: cross-env TZ=Australia/Adelaide TS_NODE_PROJECT=e2e/tsconfig.json wdio run e2e/configs/wdio.sauce.conf.ts
scripts.test:e2e:saucelabs:availability: cross-env TZ=Australia/Adelaide TS_NODE_PROJECT=e2e/tsconfig.json  wdio run  e2e/configs/wdio.availability.conf.ts -l debug
